title: Will I get a degree with NIOS certificate? - Quora

response.answer_text: NIOS is a national level board providing education from 1st to 12th standard through ODL mode. At basic education there is a OBE (Open Basic Education), secondary and senior secondary level. There are two admission cycle namely block-1 and block-2, the examination for the same conducted during April-May and October-November of respective year. In addition to above, very unique pattern of examination is also available at secondary and senior secondary level with some specific criteria under ODEs (On Demand Examination ) under stream-3 and stream-4. After passing any of said examination NIOS will issue marks statement, migration etc. as per norms of specific stream. For detail please visit nios.ac.in
For sure if you pass the exam you would get after 45 days of result declared.
